name: poppy dot necklace
description:
My dot collection is made by sifting crushed glass onto a dapped disc of fine silver. Once the surface is well coated I torch fire the disc to fuse the crushed glass to the silver creating an even surface. I repeat the process until the surface of the silver is well covered in a rich hue. After I solder a bail to the pendants I clean them to a shine, string them on hand cut chain and solder on a handmade clasp. 

This poppy dot is a deep red, just like my favorite late spring bloom. The back has a satin finish, a nice contrast to the shiny enamel. It is about half an inch and hangs on a 16 inch chain. 

*please note this item is made to order with a 1-2 week fabrication time*

All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. 

**If this purchase is meant to be a gift please let me know, I'd love to type a message for the recipient. Enter the note's content in message to seller at checkout and I'll send out your love note!**

Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method.

name: sea foam and smoke double dot necklace
description:
I enjoy my dot collection so much that I decided to add a second, teeny dot to my dot necklace. My dot collection is made by sifting crushed glass onto a dapped disc of fine silver. Once the surface is well coated I torch fire the disc to fuse the crushed glass to the silver creating an even surface. I repeat the process until the surface of the silver is well covered. 

This necklace has a sea foam dot subtly accented with a smaller smoke colored dot. 

This necklace has two lovely charms, the largest being about half an inch and the smallest being 3/8 of an inch. Each has its own chain but is attached to the same clasp so they don't get tangled. The longer chain measures 16 inches while the shorter chain is about 15.5 inches. 

The pendants are fine silver with torch fired enamels. The chain and clasp are sterling silver.  **please note there is a 1-2 week fabrication time on this item**

All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. 

*If this purchase is meant to be a gift please let me know, I'd love to type a message for the recipient. Enter the note's content in message to seller at checkout and I'll send out your love note!*

Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method.

name: dot earrings with splashes of color
description: My dot earrings serve as a way for me to explore color. The form is simple, allowing my focus to be mainly on the process of fusing colored glass to metal. These earrings are made of fine silver discs formed by hand, measuring 9mm round. I sift crushed glass into these silver cups and use my torch to fuse glass to metal. I repeat the process a few times to achieve a rich, vibrant color. Once I am pleased with the hue I solder a post to the back and clean the silver to a shine. These are made of fine silver discs formed by hand. I filled the fine silver cups with blue enamel and torch-fired them. This process was repeated many times to achieve a rich color. I also played with allowing the flame to oxidize the sifted glass. *please note that the color may vary slightly as they are handmade* The first is a smoke dot, a basic shade of grey with a slight hint of green, the perfect neutral hue and the mustard dash adds a refreshing summery look. The second pair is smoky grey, the perfect neutral tone to show off my favorite shade of aqua. The last pair is a shade of minty green with a splash of marigold which reminds me of the sea and summer sun. *please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication on this item* All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. *If this purchase is meant to be a gift please let me know, I'd love to type a message for the recipient. Enter the note's content in message to seller at checkout and I'll send out your love note!* Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method.

name: to the moon and back necklace
description:
This new necklace has been months in the making. After making some simple itty bitty necklaces I realized I needed another option, a piece just as simple and timeless but with a little something extra. I came to see I needed more circles and texture! Those rusty old hammers I collect have been growing in numbers but had yet to be used. They had a home on my hammer wall but didn't have a home in my line of jewelry. I tested a few, found some new textures I fell in love with, then played around with how I wanted these textures to mingle and fit together. Somehow my design quickly fell into place. One, oxidized circle would be front and center while one lined, hazy circle would fall to the right and one dappled, cratered circle would fall to the left. After showing off my new design I had heard over and over how this piece reminded folks of moons. 

Calling this "to the moon and back" came naturally. This necklace was made out of my love of playing with textures and the hammers that create them. It came out of my passion to push myself to create a new design to keep me inspired and in love with my work. This necklace came from a desire I had to wear something new. 

I hope you can find your own meaning from this piece. To me the circles represent the dark, stormy times we need to forge through, the hazy times which prevent us from seeing our lives clearly and the dappled days of sunlight and clarity when love is right there in front of us.

Each moon is 5mm small and hangs on a 16 inch chain. The clasp is handmade and the chain is cut by me, so if you need a different size please don't hesitate to ask. [please note that there may be an extra charge depending on the amount of chain needed so please request a custom order.] Please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication on this item.

All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and wrapped with a twine bow. Your jewelry will be in wrapped in tarnish resistant paper for your storing convenience.

If this purchase is meant to be a gift I’d love to type a message for you. Just leave the content in message to seller at checkout . 

Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method.

name: smoke, sea foam and marigold dot earrings
description: Here's an addition to my simply timeless dot series. Dot earrings are made by sifting crushed glass onto a dapped disc of fine silver. Once the surface is well coated I torch fire the disc to fuse the crushed glass to the silver creating an even surface. I repeat the process until the surface of the silver is well covered. Once I achieve a rich color I solder a post to the back of these simple earrings then I add a shiny finish. Smoke dots (grey) are a basic shade of grey with a slight hint of green. The perfect neutral hue. Marigold (mustard yellow) dots are the perfect shade of mustard yellow. Bright and cheery, just the right accent to your wardrobe. Sea foam (light green/blue) dots are a vibrant shade of aqua, just right for those long days on the beach. *Please allow one to two weeks for fabrication on this item* *If this purchase is meant to be a gift please let me know, I'd love to type a message for the recipient. name: forget-me-not necklace
description: This dainty flower is one I came across in a warehouse full of vintage findings. It reminded me of a little forget-me-not bloom, delicate flowers serving as a strong symbol for love, romance and remembrance. As best said by Henry David Thoreau, "It is one of the most interesting minute flowers. It is the more beautiful for being small and unpretending; even flowers must be modest." I had these flowers cast in silver. After cleaning up the castings and playing around with a few designs I decided to keep this piece modest and to the point. I soldered a bail to a petal and gave the flower a slight matte texture, like that of a hazy memory. Then I chose a simple chain and made a clasp, each half mimicking the shape of a single petal which interlock. I offer these in a satin finish as well as oxidized, the satin representing a current romance while the oxidized representing a memory of a love lost. This 10.5mm flower hangs from a dainty 16 inch chain. It is made from sterling silver which I finished in two options, satin and oxidized, both mimic the weathering of iron work. For matching earrings take a look at this listing, http://www.kobrienjewelry.com/product/forget-me-not-earrings **please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication on this item** All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. If this is a gift + you'd like a message sent with it feel free to send me an email [kobrienjewelry@gmail.com] including the content of the message. Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method. Pin It

name: aster dangles
description: Aster dangles are part of my iron work inspired series. They are reminiscent of the art deco period. The lines are simple gestures to indicate the many petals that make up an aster flower. Keeping with the simple aesthetic that is so very deco I used the simplest of ear wires. I chose to leave the wire long to spice up these otherwise simple earrings. The first pair is oxidized then tumbled allowing the edges to shine. The second pair is tumbled to a silver shine. I have two options for these earrings. The longer pair are about 5/8" wide and the ear wire hangs about 2.5" long. The short pair is 5/8" wide and hangs 1.5" long. **Please note that only the oxidized version are part of the flash sale. They are $10 off with free USPS Priority domestic shipping. Shiny asters can be requested with a 1-2 week fabrication time.** All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. If this is a gift + you'd like a message sent with it feel free to send me an email [kobrienjewelry@gmail.com] including the content of the message. Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest option.

name: Parisian blue nasturtium necklace
description: I decided to play with some shapes and vary from the perfect circle I have been using for so long. I took my inspiration from some nasturtium plants I had been growing on the fire escape. The irregular shape of the leaves intrigued me as I watered them day after day and with them in mind I stretched and hammered some perfect circles into a more organic shape. My colors are often inspired by nature and they take so well to this unusual leaf shape. I decided to add some other new elements to the design, the back of the pendant has a satin finish (which I love!), while the edges of the pendant are shiny and the clasp mimics the nasturtium shape. This necklace measures 16 inches long so it hangs at your collarbone and the pendant is about 1/2 an inch 'round'. I love this Parisian blue and hope you do too! **please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication time on this item** All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. *If this purchase is meant to be a gift please let me know, I'd love to type a message for the recipient. Enter the note's content in message to seller at checkout and I'll send out your love note!* Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method.

name: plum nasturtium and frost dot necklace
description: I decided to play with some shapes and vary from the perfect circle I have been using for so long. I took my inspiration from some nasturtium plants I had been growing on the fire escape. The irregular shape of the leaves intrigued me as I watered them day after day and with them in mind I stretched and hammered some perfect circles into a more organic shape. And since I had been using those perfect little circles for so long and grew so attached, I decided to add one as an accent. This necklace has two lovely charms, the largest being about half an inch and in a lovely shade of plum and the smallest being 3/8 of an inch in a pale green I call first frost. Each has its own chain but is attached to the same clasp so they don't get tangled. The longer chain measures 16 inches while the shorter chain is about 15.5 inches. My enamel work is made by sifting crushed glass onto a dapped disc of fine silver. Once the surface is well coated I torch fire the disc to fuse the crushed glass to the silver creating an even surface. I repeat the process until the surface of the silver is well covered in a rich hue. After I solder a bail to the pendants I clean them to a shine, string them on hand cut sterling silver chain and solder on a handmade clasp. **please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication time on this item as it is made to order** All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. Parisian blue dots are the perfect shade of navy reminding me of those lovely Parisian striped shirts we all own and love. *please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication on this item* All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. name: daisy chain necklace
description: Iron work has always attracted my attention. I am drawn to the free forms of a heavy, industrial metal. What may attract me most is iron work generally has a lovely flower, often right in the center of a design. I took my love of forging and brought it to a smaller scale. A wearable scale with my daisy necklace. This hoop is two and a half inches long and hangs from a 17 inch, textured chain which closes with a handmade clasp. The hoop has a slight texture on it that I created with an old, rusty hammer. I added a daisy just off center. It comes in matte or oxidized finish. **these necklaces are made to order, please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication time** All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. If this is a gift + you'd like a message sent with it feel free to send me an email [kobrienjewelry@gmail.com] including the content of the message. name: daisy chain hoop earrings
description: Iron work has always attracted my attention. I am drawn to the free forms of a heavy, industrial metal. What may attract me most is iron work generally has a lovely flower, often right in the center of a design. I took my love of forging and brought it to a smaller scale, a wearable scale, with my daisy hoops. These hoops are two and a half inches and hang from a french ear wire. There is a slight texture on them I created with an old, rusty hammer. I added a daisy just off center. There is a sweet little bail at the top of the hoops which keep them in place, making the daisy stay put. This bail also allows the earrings to dance rather well from the ear wire. Though they may not look it, these daisy hoops are rather light. **please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication time on this item** All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. name: teal and poppy double dot necklace
description: I love my dot collection so much that I decided to add a second, teeny dot to my dot necklace. My dot collection is made by sifting crushed glass onto a dapped disc of fine silver. Once the surface is well coated I torch fire the disc to fuse the crushed glass to the silver creating an even surface. I repeat the process until the surface of the silver is well covered in a rich hue. After I solder a bail to the pendants I clean them to a shine, string them on hand cut chain and solder on a handmade clasp. This necklace has a teal base with a splash of poppy red. The teeny dot is bright poppy, the perfect accent for this teal. I love the pop of color. This necklace has two lovely charms, the largest being about half an inch and the smallest being 3/8 of an inch. Each has its own chain but is attached to the same clasp so they don't get tangled. The longer chain measures 16 inches while the shorter chain is about 15.5 inches. The pendants are fine silver with torch fired enamels. The chain and clasp are sterling silver. *please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication on this item* All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. name: spruce dot earrings
description: My dot earrings serve as a way for me to explore color. The form is simple, allowing my focus to be mainly on the process of fusing colored glass to metal. These earrings are made of fine silver discs formed by hand, measuring 9mm round. I sift crushed glass into these silver cups and use my torch to fuse glass to metal. I repeat the process a few times to achieve a rich, vibrant color. Once I am pleased with the hue I solder a post to the back and clean the silver to a shine. These colors make me swoon, I hope you feel the same. This shade of spruce is a deep forest green. **please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication time on this item** All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. *If your purchase is meant to be a gift please let me know, I'd love to type a message for the recipient. This little speck of color is 9mm, perfect to be seen and just the right size for everyday wear. These are made of fine silver discs formed by hand. I filled the fine silver cups with pink enamel and torch-fired them. This process was repeated many times to achieve a rich color. I also played with allowing the flame to oxidize the sifted glass. *please note that the color may vary slightly as they are handmade* **please allow 1-2 weeks for fabrication time on this item** All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. name: moon post earrings
description: These shimmery little discs are ever so fun to make and wear. My moon earrings were originally designed from some scrap silver which kept catching my eye on my jewelers bench. I had a commission to make a boutonniere for a wedding. It was made of silver sheet which was hand textured with a scribe and ruler. The texture was so lovely that I kept the scraps around waiting to make something of them. I finally punched some holes in the sheet and dapped them slightly. A post was soldered onto the back and violà, the moon post earrings came to being. They have proven to be popular and are now made from sheet purposely textured for these earrings. I still love their simplicity, ability to capture and reflect light and color and dainty charm. The Details: Small moon earrings are 6mm round. Medium moon earrings are 8mm round. Large moon earrings are 9mm round. All sizes come in either a shiny finish or oxidized. Each size + finish are also offered as a single earring. All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. If this is a gift + you'd like a message sent with it feel free to send me an email [kobrienjewelry@gmail.com] including the content of the message. name: silver box earrings
description: My box earrings are simple, hand-shaped dangles with a lovely little accent bead. Perfect for everyday wear. The silver wire has nice and smooth ends and has been tumbled for shine and spring. The details: earrings hang about 2" long and are about 3/4" wide, sterling silver ear wire, Czech glass fire polished silver matte bead. All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. If this is a gift + you'd like a message sent with it feel free to send me an email [kobrienjewelry@gmail.com] including the content of the message. Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method. Pin It

name: olive jade box earrings
description: I have heaping bowls of beads lying around the studio, waiting to become accents for jewelry. I decided to use a most basic structure to allow the beads to speak for themselves. I hope you enjoy these simply beautiful earrings. The large box earrings hang just about 2" and are 3/4" wide The small box earrings hang about 1.25" and are about 0.5" wide All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and tied with a bow. The jewelry will be in either a tarnish resistant bag or paper for your storing convenience. If this is a gift + you'd like a message sent with it feel free to send me an email [kobrienjewelry@gmail.com] including the content of the message. Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method.

name: funky hoop earrings
description: I had a sleepless night a while back. Images of earrings were swimming in my head. I got out of bed and sketched them in my book and returned to my pillow excited about my new designs. The next day I went to the studio and put aside all of my work in progress and focused on these hoops. I love their simplicity and had fun making them. (And wearing a pair too!) They are formed on my bracelet mandrel, textured with an old hammer and completed with a lovely satin or oxidized finish. These hoops hang on handmade french ear wires and dangle about 3 and 7/8 inches long and are almost 2.25 wide. All of my jewelry is sent in a kraft colored jewelry box made of recycled materials and wrapped with a twine bow. The jewelry will be packed in tarnish resistant paper for your storing convenience. *If this purchase is meant to be a gift please let me know, I'd love to type a message for the recipient. Enter the note's content in message to seller at checkout and I'll send out your love note!* Shipping prices include priority shipping and insurance for domestic shipping. On international shipping I choose the cheapest method.
